articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Justin Langer's future as coach still unclear after marathon Cricket Australia board meeting
articles.description: Cricket Australia says it will hold "confidential discussions" with Justin Langer about his future as national men's coach following a lengthy board meeting on Friday.
articles.content:
Cricket Australia (CA) says it will hold "confidential discussions" with Justin Langer about his future as national men's coach following a marathon board meeting on Friday.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
